document.title: Database van de Zuidelijk-Nederlandse Dialecten (DSDD)
document.intro: The Database of the Southern Dutch Dialects (DSDD) is an aggregation of three regional dialect dictionaries: the Dictionary of Flemish Dialects (Woordenboek van de Vlaamse Dialecten - WVD), the Dictionary of the Brabantian Dialects (Woordenboek van de Brabantse Dialecten - WBD), and the... syntactically annotated text fragments
